name: hymnalBeta
other: Please note that this is a converted sql database. If you would like the orignal content please contact the developer

data.title: Praise to the Lord
data.preview: <verse>Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creatio
data.data: <verse>Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation!O my soul, praise Him, for He is thy health and salvation!All ye who hear, now to His temple draw near;Join ye in glad adoration!</verse><verse>Praise to the Lord, Who o'er all things so wondrously reigneth,Shieldeth thee under His wings, yea, so gently sustaineth!Hast thou not seen how thy desires e'er have beenGranted in what He ordaineth?</verse><verse>Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper thy work and defend thee;Surely His goodness and mercy here daily attend thee.Ponder anew what the Almighty can do,If with His love He befriend thee.</verse>

data.title: All creatures of our God and King
data.preview: <verse>All creatures of our God and King,Lift up your voice
data.data: <verse>All creatures of our God and King,Lift up your voice with us and sing:Alleluia! Alleluia!O burning sun with golden beamAnd silver moon with softer gleam:</verse><chorus>Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!</chorus><verse>O rushing wind and breezes soft,O clouds that ride the winds aloft:Oh, praise Him! Alleluia!O rising morn, in praise rejoice,O lights of evening, find a voice.</verse><verse> O flowing waters, pure and clear,Make music for your Lord to hear.Oh praise Him! Alleluia!O fire so masterful and bright,Providing us with warmth and light.</verse><verse>Let all things their Creator bless,And worship him in humbleness,O praise him Alleluia!Oh, praise the Father, praise the Son,And praise the Spirit, three in One!</verse>

data.title: God Himself Is With Us
data.preview: <verse>God Himself is with us; Let us all adore Him,And with
data.data: <verse>God Himself is with us; Let us all adore Him,And with awe appear before Him.God is here within us; Soul, in silence fear Him, Humbly, fervently draw near Him.Now His own who have known God,In worship lowly,Yield their spirits wholly.</verse><verse>Come, abide within me; Let my soul, like Mary,Be thine earthly sanctuary,Come, in-dwelling Spirit, With transfigured splendour;Love and honour will I render.Where I go here below, Let me bow before Thee.Know Thee and adore Thee</verse><verse>Gladly we surrender Earth's deceitful treasures,Pride of Life, and sinful pleasures:Gladly, Lord, we offer Thine to be forever,Soul and life and each endeavour.Thou alone shalt be known Lord of all our being,Life's true way decreeing.</verse>

data.title: Praise, My Soul, the King of Heaven
data.preview: <verse>Praise, my soul, the King of heaven;To His feet thy t
data.data: <verse>Praise, my soul, the King of heaven;To His feet thy tribute bring.Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven,Who like thee His praise should sing?Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,Praise the everlasting King.</verse><verse>Praise Him for His grace and favorTo our fathers in distress.Praise Him, still the same forever,Slow to chide and swift to bless:Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,Glorious in His faithfulness.</verse><verse>Tenderly He shields and spares us;Well our feeble frame He knows.In His hands He gently bears us,Rescues us from all our foes.Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,Widely as His mercy flows.</verse><verse>Angels, help us to adore Him:Ye behold Him face to face;Sun and moon, bow down before Him:Dwellers all in time and space.Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,Praise with us the God of grace.</verse>

data.title: All My Hope on God is Founded
data.preview: <verse>All my hope on God is founded;He doth still my trust
data.data: <verse>All my hope on God is founded;He doth still my trust renew,Me through change and chance He guideth,Only good and only true.God unknown, He alone Calls my heart to be His own.</verse><verse>Pride of man and earthly glory,Sword and crown betray his trust;What with care and toil he buildeth,Tower and temple fall to dust.But God's power, hour to hour, Is my temple and my tower.</verse><verse>God's great goodness aye endureth,Deep His wisdom, passing thought:Splendour, light, and life attend Him,Beauty springeth out of naught.Love doth stand at His hand: Joy doth wait on His command.</verse><verse>Still from man to God eternalSacrifice of praise be done,High above all praises praisingFor the gift of Christ His Son.Christ doth call one and all;  Ye who follow shall not fall.</verse>

data.title: O Worship the Lord
data.preview: <verse>O worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness,Bow down
data.data: <verse>O worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness,Bow down before Him, His glory proclaim;With gold of obedience, and incense of lowliness,Kneel and adore Him: the Lord is His name.</verse><verse>Low at His feet lay thy burden of carefulness,High on His heart He will bear it for thee,Comfort thy sorrows, and answer thy prayerfulness,Guiding thy steps as may best for thee be.</verse><verse>Fear not to enter His courts in the slendernessOf the poor wealth thou wouldst reckon as thine;Truth in its beauty, and love in its tenderness,These are the offerings to lay on His shrine.</verse><verse>These, though we bring them in trembling and fearfulness,He will accept for the name that is dear;Mornings of joy give for evenings of tearfulness,Trust for our trembling, and hope for our fear.</verse>

data.title: The Lord in Zion Reigneth
data.preview: <verse>The Lord in Zion reigneth, let all the world rejoice,
data.data: <verse>The Lord in Zion reigneth, let all the world rejoice,And come before His throne of grace with tuneful heart and voice;The Lord in Zion reigneth, and there His praise shall ring,To Him shall princes bend the knee and kings their glory bring.</verse><verse>The Lord in Zion reigneth, and who so great as He?The depths of earth are in His hands; He rules the mighty sea.O crown His Name with honor, and let His standard wave,Till distant isles beyond the deep shall own His power to save.</verse><verse>The Lord in Zion reigneth, these hours to Him belong;O enter now His temple gates, and fill His courts with song;Beneath His royal banner let every creature fall,Exalt the King of heaven and earth, and crown Him Lord of all.</verse>

data.title: We Gather Together
data.preview: <verse>We gather together to ask the Lord's blessing;He chas
data.data: <verse>We gather together to ask the Lord's blessing;He chastens and hastens His will to make known.The wicked oppressing now cease from distressing.Sing praises to His Name; He forgets not His own.</verse><verse>Beside us to guide us, our God with us joining,Ordaining, maintaining His kingdom divine;So from the beginning the fight we were winning;Thou, Lord, wast at our side, all glory be Thine!</verse><verse>We all do extol Thee, Thou leader triumphant,And pray that Thou still our Defender wilt be.Let Thy congregation escape tribulation;Thy name be ever praised! O Lord, make us free!</verse>

data.title: Let All the World in Every Corner Sing
data.preview: <verse>Let all the world in every corner sing,My God and Kin
data.data: <verse>Let all the world in every corner sing,My God and King!The heavens are not too highHis praise may thither fly;The earth is not too low,His praises there may grow,Let all the world in every corner singMy God and King!</verse><verse>Let all the world in every corner singMy God and King!The church with psalms must shoutNo door can keep them out;But, above all, the heartMust bear the longest partLet all the world in every corner singMy God and King!</verse>

data.title: Come, Christians, Join to Sing
data.preview: <verse>Come, Christians, join to sing,Alleluia! Amen!Loud pr
data.data: <verse>Come, Christians, join to sing,Alleluia! Amen!Loud praise to Christ our King;Alleluia! Amen!Let all, with heart and voice,Before His throne rejoice;Praise is His gracious choice:Alleluia! Amen!</verse><verse>Come, lift your hearts on High;Alleluia! Amen!Let praises fill the sky;Alleluia! Amen!He is our Guide and Friend;To us He'll condescend;His love shall never end:Alleluia! Amen!</verse><verse>Praise yet our Christ again;Alleluia! Amen!Life shall not end the strain;Alleluia! Amen!On heaven's blissful shoreHis goodness we'll adore,Singing forevermore,Alleluia! Amen!</verse>

data.title: The God of Abraham Praise
data.preview: <verse>The God of Abraham praise,Who reigns enthroned above;
data.data: <verse>The God of Abraham praise,Who reigns enthroned above;Ancient of everlasting days,And God of love;Jehovah! Great I AM!By earth and heaven confessed;I bow and bless the sacred name,Forever blest.</verse><verse>The God of Abraham praise,At whose supreme commandFrom earth I rise, and seek the joysAt His right hand;I all on earth forsake,Its wisdom, fame and power;And Him my only portion make,My shield and tower.</verse><verse>The whole triumphant hostGive thanks to God on high;"Hail, Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!"They ever cry;Hail, Abraham's God and mine!I join the heavenly lays;All might and majesty are Thine,And endless praise.</verse>

data.title: Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee
data.preview: <verse>Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee,God of glory, Lord of l
data.data: <verse>Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee,God of glory, Lord of love;Hearts unfold like flow'rs before Thee,Hail Thee as the sun above.Melt the clouds of sin and sadness,Drive the dark of doubt away;Giver of immortal gladness,Fill us with the light of day!</verse><verse>All Thy works with joy surround Thee,Earth and heav'n reflect Thy rays,Stars and angels sing around Thee,Center of unbroken praise;Field and forest, vale and mountain,Bloss'ming meadow, flashing sea,Chanting bird and flowing fountainCall us to rejoice in Thee.</verse><verse>Thou art giving and forgiving,Ever blessing, ever blest,Wellspring of the joy of living,Oceandepth of happy rest!Thou the father, Christ our Brother -All who live in love are Thine:Teach us how to love each other,Lift us to the joy divine.</verse>

data.title: New Songs of Celebration Render
data.preview: <verse>New songs of celebration renderTo Him who has great w
data.data: <verse>New songs of celebration renderTo Him who has great wonders done.Love sits enthroned in ageless splendor:Come, and adore the mighty One.He has made known His great salvationWhich all His friends with joy confess:He has revealed to every nationHis everlasting righteousness.</verse><verse>Joyfully, heartily resounding,Let every instrument and voicePeal out the praise of grace aboundingCalling the whole world to rejoice.Trumpets and organs, set in motionSuch sounds as make the heavens ring;All things that live in earth and ocean,Make music for your mighty King.</verse><verse>Rivers and seas and torrents roaring,Honor the Lord with wild acclaim;Mountains and stones look up adoring,And find a voice to praise His name.Righteous, commanding, ever glorious,Praises be His that never cease:Just is our God, whose truth victorious,Establishes the world in peace.</verse>

data.title: Let Us Praise the Name of the Lord
data.preview: <verse>Let us praise the name of the Lord!Give Him glory, Am
data.data: <verse>Let us praise the name of the Lord!Give Him glory, Amen.</verse><chorus>Amen, amen, Amen, amen.</chorus><verse>Go ye into all the world.Alleluia, Amen.</verse>

data.title: My Maker and My King
data.preview: <verse>My Maker and my King,To Thee my all I owe;Thy soverei
data.data: <verse>My Maker and my King,To Thee my all I owe;Thy sovereign bounty is the springWhence all my blessings flow;Thy sovereign bounty is the springWhence all my blessings flow.</verse><verse>The creature of Thy hand,On Thee alone I live;My God, Thy benefits demandMore praise than I can give.My God, Thy benefits demandMore praise than I can give.</verse><verse>Lord, what can I impartWhen all is Thine before?Thy love demands a thankful heart;The gift, alas! how poor.Thy love demands a thankful heart;The gift, alas! how poor.</verse><verse>O! let Thy grace inspireMy soul with strength divine;Let every word and each desireAnd all my days be Thine.Let every word and each desireAnd all my days be Thine.</verse>

data.title: All People That on Earth Do Well
data.preview: <verse>All people that on earth do dwell,Sing to the Lord wi
data.data: <verse>All people that on earth do dwell,Sing to the Lord with cheerful voice.Him serve with mirth, his praise forth tell;Come ye before him and rejoice.</verse><verse>Know that the Lord is God indeed;Without our aid He did us make;We are His folk, He doth us feed,And for His sheep He doth us take.</verse><verse>O enter then His gates with praise;Approach with joy His courts unto;Praise, laud, and bless His name always,For it is seemly so to do.</verse><verse>For why! the Lord our God is good;His mercy is forever sure;His truth at all times firmly stood,And shall from age to age endure.</verse>

data.title: Lord of All Being, Throned Afar
data.preview: <verse>Lord of all being, throned afar,Thy glory flames from
data.data: <verse>Lord of all being, throned afar,Thy glory flames from sun and star;Center and soul of every sphereYet to each loving heart how near!Yet to each loving heart how near!</verse><verse>Sun of our life, Thy quickening rayShed on our path the glow of day;Star of our hope, Thy softened lightCheers the long watches of the night,Cheers the long watches of the night.</verse><verse>Our midnight is Thy smile withdrawn;Our noontide is Thy gracious dawn;Our rainbow arch, Thy mercy's sign;All, save the clouds of sin, are Thine,All, save the clouds of sin, are Thine.</verse><verse>Lord of all life, below, aboveWhose light is truth, whose warmth is love,Before Thy ever-blazing throneWe ask no lustre of our own,We ask no lustre of our own.</verse><verse>Grant us Thy truth to make us freeAnd kindling hearts that burn for Thee;Till all Thy living altars claimOne holy light, one heavenly flame!One holy light, one heavenly flame.</verse>

data.title: O Morning Star, How Fair and Bright
data.preview: <verse>O Morning Star, how fair and bright!You shine with Go
data.data: <verse>O Morning Star, how fair and bright!You shine with God's own truth and light,Aglow with grace and mercy!Of Jacob's race, King David's son,Our Lord and Master, You have wonOur hearts to serve You only!Lowly, Holy!Great and Glorious, all victorious,Rich in blessing! Rule and might o'er all possessing!</verse><verse>Lord, when you look on us in love,At once there falls from God aboveA ray of purest pleasure.Your Word and Spirit, flesh and blood,Refresh our souls with heav-'nly food.You are our dearest treasure!Let Your mercy warm and cheer us!O draw near us! For You teach usGod's own love through You has reached us.</verse><verse>Almighty Father, in Your SonYou loved us, when not yet begunWas this old earth's foundation!Your Son has ransomed us in loveTo live in Him here and above:This is Your great salvation.Alleluia! Christ the living,To us giving life forever,Keeps us Yours and fails us never!</verse><verse>O let the harps break forth in song!Our joy be all with music crowned,Our voices gaily blending!For Christ goes with us all the way 'Today, tomorrow, every day!His love is never ending!Sing out! Ring out!Jubilation! Exultation!Tell the story!Great is He, the King of glory!</verse>

data.title: O Sing a New Song to the Lord
data.preview: <verse>O sing a new song to the LordFor marvels He has done;
data.data: <verse>O sing a new song to the LordFor marvels He has done;His right hand and His holy armThe victory have won.</verse><verse>With harp, with harp and voice of psalmsUnto Jehovah sing;Let trumpets and the echoing hornAcclaim the Lord our King!</verse><verse>Let seas with all their creatures roar,The world and dwellers there,And let the rivers clap their hands,The hills their joy declare.</verse><verse>Before the Lord: because He comes,To judge the earth come He;He'll judge the worldWith righteousness,His folk with equity.</verse>

data.title: O Praise Ye the Lord
data.preview: <verse>O praise ye the Lord!Praise Him in the height;Rejoice
data.data: <verse>O praise ye the Lord!Praise Him in the height;Rejoice in His word,Ye angels of light;Ye heavens, adore HimBy whom ye were made,And worship before Him,In brightness arrayed.</verse><verse>O praise ye the Lord!Praise Him upon earth,In tuneful accord:Ye sons of new birth;Praise Him who hath broughtYou His grace from above,Praise Him who hath taughtYou To sing of His love.</verse><verse>O praise ye the Lord,All things that give sound;Each jubilant chord,Re-echo around;Loud organs His gloryForth tell in deep tone,And sweet harp, the storyOf what He hath done.</verse><verse>O praise ye the Lord!Thanksgiving and songTo Him be outpouredAll ages along:For love in creation,For heaven restored.For grace of salvation,O praise ye the Lord!</verse>

data.title: Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise
data.preview: <verse>Immortal, invisible, God only wise,In light inaccessi
data.data: <verse>Immortal, invisible, God only wise,In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,Almighty, victorious, Thy great Name we praise.</verse><verse>Unresting, unhasting, and silent as light,Nor wanting, nor wasting, Thou rulest in might;Thy justice, like mountains, high soaring aboveThy clouds, which are fountains of goodness and love.</verse><verse>To all life Thou givest to both great and small;In all life Thou livest, the true life of all;We blossom and flourish like leaves on the tree,And wither and perish - but naught changeth Thee.</verse><verse>Great Father of glory, pure Father of light,Thine angels adore Thee, all veiling their sight;All laud we would render; O help us to see'Tis only the splendour of light hideth Thee!</verse>

data.title: God Is Our Song
data.preview: <verse>God is our Song, and every singer blestWho praising H
data.data: <verse>God is our Song, and every singer blestWho praising Him finds energy and rest.All who praise God with unaffected joyGive back to us the widom we destroy,Give back to us the widom we destroy.</verse><verse>God is our Song, for Jesus comes to save;While praising Him we offer all we have.New songs we sing, in ventures new unite,When Jesus leads us upward into light,When Jesus leads us upward into light.</verse><verse>This is the Song no conflict ever drowns;Who praises God our human wrath disowns.Love knows what rich complexities of soundGod builds upon a simple common ground,God builds upon a simple common ground.</verse><verse>God is our Silence when no songs are sung,When ecstasy or sorrow stills the tongue.Glorious the faith which silently obeysUntil we find again the voice of praise,Until we find again the voice of praise.</verse>

data.title: Now the Joyful Bells A-Ringing
data.preview: <verse>Now the joyful bells a-ringing,All ye mountains, of t
data.data: <verse>Now the joyful bells a-ringing,All ye mountains, of the Lord!Lift our hearts like birds a winging,All ye mountains, praise the Lord!Now our festal season bringingKinsmen all to bide and board,Sets our cheery voices singing:All ye mountains, praise the Lord!</verse><verse>Dear our home as dear none other;Where the mountains praise the Lord!Gladly here our care we smother;Where the mountains praise the Lord!Here we know that Christ our brotherBinds us all as by a cord:He was born of Mary motherWhere the mountains praise the Lord!</verse><verse>Cold the year, new whiteness wearing,All ye mountains, praise the Lord!Peace, good will to us abearing,All ye mountains praise the Lord!Now we all God's goodness sharingBreak the bread and sheath the sword:Bright our hearts the signal flaring,All ye mountains, praise the Lord!</verse>

data.title: Every Star Shall Sing a Carol
data.preview: <verse>Every star shall sing a carol;Every creature, high or
data.data: <verse>Every star shall sing a carol;Every creature, high or low,Come and praise the King of heavenBy whatever name you know.</verse><chorus>God above, Man below,Holy is the name I know.</chorus><verse>When the King of all creationHad a cradle on the earth,Holy was the human body,Holy was the human birth.</verse><verse>Every star and every planet,Every creature, high or low,Come and praise the King of heavenBy whatever name you know.</verse>

data.title: Praise the Lord, His Glories Show
data.preview: <verse>Praise the Lord, His glories show, Alleluia!Saints wi
data.data: <verse>Praise the Lord, His glories show, Alleluia!Saints within His courts below, Alleluia!Angels 'round His throne above, Alleluia!All that see and share His love, Alleluia!</verse><verse>Earth to heaven and heaven to earth, Alleluia!Tell His wonders, sing His worth, Alleluia!Age to age and shore to shore, Alleluia!Praise Him, praise Him evermore! Alleluia!</verse><verse>Praise the Lord, His mercies trace, Alleluia!Praise His providence and grace, Alleluia!All that He for man hath done, Alleluia!All He sends us through His Son. Alleluia!</verse>

data.title: Praise the Lord! You Heavens Adore Him
data.preview: <verse>Praise the Lord: you heavens, adore Him;Praise Him, a
data.data: <verse>Praise the Lord: you heavens, adore Him;Praise Him, angels in the height;Sun and moon, rejoice before Him;Praise Him, all you stars of light.Praise the Lord, for He has spoken;Worlds His mighty voice obeyed.Laws which never shall be brokenFor their guidance He has made.</verse><verse>Praise the Lord! for He is glorious;Never shall His promise fail.God has made His saints victorious;Sin and death shall not prevail.Praise the God of our salvation!Hosts on high, His power proclaim.Heaven and earth and all creation,Laud and magnify His Name.</verse><verse>Worship, honor, glory, blessing,Lord, we offer as our gift.Young and old, Your praise expressing,Our glad songs to You we lift.All the saints in heaven adore You;We would join their glad acclaim;As Your angels serve before You,So on earth we praise Your name.</verse>

data.title: Rejoice, Ye Pure in Heart!
data.preview: <verse>Rejoice ye pure in heart!Rejoice, give thanks, and si
data.data: <verse>Rejoice ye pure in heart!Rejoice, give thanks, and sing;Your festal banner wave on high,The cross of Christ your King.</verse><chorus>Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice,Give thanks and sing.</chorus><verse>With voice as full and strongAs ocean's surging praise,Send forth the sturdy hymns of old,The psalms of ancient days.</verse><verse>With all the angel choirs,With all the saints of earth,Pour out the strains of joy and bliss,True rapture, noblest mirth.</verse><verse>Yes, on through life's long path,Still chanting as ye go;From youth to age, by night and day,In gladness and in woe.</verse><verse>Praise Him who reigns on high,The Lord whom we adore,The Father, Son and Holy Ghost,One God forever more.</verse>

data.title: Praise We the Lord
data.preview: <verse>Praise we the Lord, who made all beautyFor all our se
data.data: <verse>Praise we the Lord, who made all beautyFor all our senses to enjoy;Owe we our humble thanks and dutyThat simple pleasures never cloy;Praise we the Lord, who made all beautyFor all our senses to enjoy.</verse><verse>Praise Him who loves to see young lovers,Fresh hearts that swell with youthful pride;Thank Him who sends the sun above us,As bridegroom fit to meet his bride;Praise Him who loves to see young lovers,Fresh hearts that swell with youthful pride.</verse><verse>Praise Him who by a simple flowerLifts up our hearts to things above;Thank Him who gives to each one powerTo find a friend to know and love;Praise Him who by a simple flowerLifts up our hearts to things above.</verse>

data.title: Sing Praise to God
data.preview: <verse>Sing praise to God who reigns above,The God of all cr
data.data: <verse>Sing praise to God who reigns above,The God of all creation,The God of power, the God of love,The God of our salvation.With healing balm my soul He fills,And every faithless murmur stills;To God all praise and glory!</verse><verse>What God's almighty power hath madeHis gracious mercy keepeth;By morning glow or evening shade,His watchful eye ne'er sleepeth,Within the kingdom of his might,Lo! all is just, and all is right:To God all praise and glory!</verse><verse>The Lord is never far away,Throughout all grief distressing,An ever present help and stay,Our peace and joy and blessing.As with a mother's tender hand,He leads His own, His chosen band:To God all praise and glory!</verse><verse>Then all my gladsome way along,I sing aloud thy praises,That men may hear the grateful songMy voice unwearied raises:Be joyful in the Lord, my heart!Both soul and body bear your part!To God all praise and glory.</verse>

data.title: Holy God, We Praise Your Name
data.preview: <verse>Holy God, we praise Your name;Lord of all, we bow bef
data.data: <verse>Holy God, we praise Your name;Lord of all, we bow before You!All on earth Your scepter claim,All in heaven above adore You;Infinite Your vast domain.Everlasting is Your reign.</verse><verse>Hark! the loud celestial hymnAngel choirs above are raising,Cherubim and seraphim,In unceasing chorus praising;Fill the heavens with sweet accord:Holy, holy, holy, Lord.</verse><verse>Holy Father, Holy Son,Holy Spirit, three we name You;While in essence only one,Undivided God we claim You;And adoring bend the knee,While we own the mystery.</verse>

data.title: Tell Out, My Soul
data.preview: <verse>Tell out, my soul, the greatness of the Lord:Unnumber
data.data: <verse>Tell out, my soul, the greatness of the Lord:Unnumbered blessings give my spirit voice;Tender to me the promise of His word;In God my Savior shall my heart rejoice.</verse><verse>Tell out, my soul, the greatness of His name:Make known His might, the deeds His arm has done;His mercy sure, from age to age the same;His holy name, the Lord, the Mighty One.</verse><verse>Tell out, my soul, the greatness of His might:Pow'rs and dominions lay their glory by;Proud hearts and stubborn wills are put to flight,The hungry fed, the humble lifted high.</verse><verse>Tell out, my soul, the glories of His word:Firm is His promise, and His mercy sure.Tell out, my soul, the greatness of the LordTo children's children and forever more.</verse>

data.title: When in Our Music God is Glorified
data.preview: <verse>When in our music God is glorified,And adoration leav
data.data: <verse>When in our music God is glorified,And adoration leaves no room for pride,It is as though the whole creation cried:Alleluia! Alleluia!</verse><verse>How oft, in making music, we have foundA new dimension in the world of sound,As worship moved us to a more profoundAlleluia! Alleluia!</verse><verse>And did not Jesus sing a psalm that nightWhen utmost evil strove against the light?Then let us sing for whom He won the fight:Alleluia! Alleluia!</verse><verse>Let every instrument be used for praise;Let all rejoice who have a voice to raise;And may God give us faith to sing always:Alleluia! Alleluia!</verse>

data.title: Sing a New Song to the Lord
data.preview: <verse>Sing a new song to the Lord,He to whom wonders belong
data.data: <verse>Sing a new song to the Lord,He to whom wonders belong.Rejoice in His triumph and tell of His power.O sing a new song to the Lord.</verse><verse>Now to the ends of the earthSee His salvation is shown.And still He remembers His mercy and truth,Unchanging in love to His own.</verse><verse>Sing a new song and rejoice.Publish His praises abroad.Let voices in chorus with trumpet and horn,Resound for the joy of the Lord.</verse><verse>Join with the hills and the sea,Thunders of praise to prolong.In judgment and justiceHe comes to the earth.O sing a new song to the Lord.</verse>

data.title: Wake the Song
data.preview: <verse>Wake the song of joy and gladness;Hither bring your n
data.data: <verse>Wake the song of joy and gladness;Hither bring your noblest lays;Bannish every thought of sadness,Pouring forth your highest praise.Sing to Him whose care has brought usOnce again with friends to meet,And whose loving voice has taught usOf the way to Jesus' feet.</verse><chorus>Wake the song, wake the song,The song of joy and gladness,Wake the song, wake the song,The song of Jubilee.</chorus><verse>Joyfully with songs and banners,We will greet the festal day;Shout aloud our glad hosannas,And our grateful homage pay.We will chant our Savior's gloryWhile our thoughts we raise above,Telling still the old, old, story,Precious theme- redeeming love!</verse><verse>Thanks to Thee, O holy Father,For the mercies of the year;May each heart, as here we gather,Swell with gratitude sincere,Thanks to Thee, O loving Savior,For redemption through Thy blood.Breathe upon us, Holy Spirit,Sweetly draw us near to God.</verse>

data.title: With Songs and Honors
data.preview: <verse>With songs and honors sounding loud,Address the Lord
data.data: <verse>With songs and honors sounding loud,Address the Lord on high;Over the heavens He spreads His cloud,And waters veil the sky.</verse><verse>He sends His showers of blessing downTo cheer the plains below;He makes the grass the mountains crown,And corning valleys grow.</verse><verse>His steady counsels change the faceOf the declining year;He bids the sun cut short his race,And wintry days appear.</verse><verse>He sends His word, and melts the snow;The fields no longer mourn;He calls the warmer gales to blow,And bids the spring return.</verse><verse>The changing wind, the flying cloud,Obey His mighty word:With songs and honors sounding loudPraise ye the sovereign Lord!</verse>

data.title: O Thou in Whose Presence
data.preview: <verse>O Thou in whose presence my soul takes delight,On who
data.data: <verse>O Thou in whose presence my soul takes delight,On whom in affliction I call,My comfort by day and my song in the night,My hope, my salvation, my all!</verse><verse>His voice, as the sound of the dulcimer sweet,Is heard through the shadows of death;The cedars of Lebanon bow at His feet,The air is perfumed with His breath.</verse><verse>His lips, as a fountain of righteousness flow,To water the gardens of grace;From which their salvation the Gentiles shall know,And bask in the smiles of His face.</verse><verse>He looks, and ten thousands of angels rejoice,And myriads wait for His word;He speaks, and eternity, filled with His voice,Re-echoes the praise of the Lord.</verse>

data.title: O Sing, My Soul, Your Maker's Praise
data.preview: <verse>O sing my soul, your Maker's praiseIn grateful hymns
data.data: <verse>O sing my soul, your Maker's praiseIn grateful hymns ascending;Whose steadfast love has crowned your daysWith heav'nly gifts un ending.I sought the Lord, He heard my cry;His holy angels hover nighThe tents of those who love Him.</verse><verse>The Lord is good to those who seekHis face in time of sorrow,Providing comfort to the weakAnd grace for each tomorrow.Though grief may tarry for a night,The morn shall break in joy and lightWith blessings from His presence.</verse><verse>The Lord will turn His face in peaceWhen troubled souls draw near Him;His loving kindness shall not ceaseTo those who trust and fear Him.Our God will not forsake His own;Eternal is His heav'nly throne;His kingdom stands forever.</verse>

data.title: Arise, My Soul, Arise!
data.preview: <verse>Arise, my soul, arise! Stretch forth to things eterna
data.data: <verse>Arise, my soul, arise! Stretch forth to things eternalAnd hasten to the feet of your Redeemer God.Though hid from mortal eyes,He dwells in light supernal;Yet worship Him in humbleness and call Him Lord.His banquet of love Awaits you above;Yet here He grants a foretaste of the feast toThe feast to come! Rejoice, my soul, rejoice,To heav'n lift up your voice:Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!</verse><verse>Now hear the harps of heav'n!Oh, hear the song victorious,The neverending anthem sounding through the sky!To mortals is not giv'n To join in strains so glorious;Yet here on earth we too can sing our praises high!He bought with His blood The ransomed of God;To Him be ever lasting pow'r and victory.And let the great amenResound through heav'n again.Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!</verse>

data.title: Lord, in the Morning
data.preview: <verse>Lord, in the morning Thou shalt hearMy voice ascendin
data.data: <verse>Lord, in the morning Thou shalt hearMy voice ascending high;To Thee will I direct my prayer,To Thee lift up mine eye-</verse><verse>Up to the hills where Christ is goneTo plead for all His saints,Presenting at His Father's throneOur songs and our complaints.</verse><verse>O may Thy Spirit guide my feetIn ways of righteousness;Make every path of duty straightAnd plain before my face.</verse><verse>The men that love and fear Thy nameShall see their hopes fulfilled;The mighty God will compass themWith favor as a shield.</verse>

data.title: The Dawn of God's Dear Sabbath
data.preview: <verse>The dawn of God's dear SabbathBreaks o'er the earth a
data.data: <verse>The dawn of God's dear SabbathBreaks o'er the earth again,As some sweet summer morningAfter a night of pain;It comes as cooling showersTo some exhausted land,As shade of clustered palm trees'Mid weary wastes of sand.</verse><verse>Lord, we would bring for offering,Though marred with earthly soil,A week of earnest labor,Of steady, faithful toil,Fair fruits of self denial,Of strong, deep love to Thee,Fostered by Thine own Spirit,In true humility.</verse><verse>And we would bring our burdenOf sinful thought and deed,In Thy pure presence kneeling,From bondage to be freed,Our heart's most bitter sorrowFor all Thy work undone-So many talents wasted!So few bright laurels won!</verse><verse>And with that sorrow mingling,A steadfast faith, and sure,And love so deep and fervent,For Thee to make it pure,In Thy dear presence findingThe pardon that we need,And then the peace so lasting-Celestial peace indeed.</verse>

data.title: O Splendor of God's Glory Bright
data.preview: <verse>O splendor of God's glory bright,From light eternal b
data.data: <verse>O splendor of God's glory bright,From light eternal bringing light;O Light of life, light's living spring,True day, all days illumining.</verse><verse>O Thou true Sun, on us Thy glanceLet fall in royal radiance;The Spirit's sanctifying beamUpon our earthly senses stream.</verse><verse>O joyful be the passing dayWith thoughts as clear as morning's ray,With faith like noontide shining bright,Our souls unshadowed by the night.</verse><verse>Dawn's glory gilds the earth and skies;Let Him, our perfect morn, arise;The Father's help His children claim,And sing the Father's glorious name. Amen.</verse>

data.title: Now That the Daylight Fills the Sky
data.preview: <verse>Now that the daylight fills the sky,We lift our heart
data.data: <verse>Now that the daylight fills the sky,We lift our hearts to God on high,That He, in all we do or say,Would keep us free from harm today;</verse><verse>Would guard our hearts and tongues from strife;From anger's din would shield our life;From evil sights would turn our eyes,And close our ears to vanities;</verse><verse>So we, when this new day is goneAnd night in turn is drawing on,With conscience by the world unstainedShall praise His name for vict'ry gained.</verse><verse>"All praise to You, creator Lord!All praise to You, eternal Word!All praise to You, O Spirit wise!"We sing as daylight fills the skies.</verse>

data.title: When Morning Gilds the Skies
data.preview: <verse>When morning gilds the skies my heart awaking cries,M
data.data: <verse>When morning gilds the skies my heart awaking cries,May Jesus Christ be praised!Alike at work and prayer, to Jesus I repair:May Jesus Christ be praised!</verse><verse>Whene'er the sweet church bell peals over hill and dell,May Jesus Christ praised!O hark to what it sings, as joyously it rings,May Jesus Christ be praised!</verse><verse>The night becomes as day when from the heart we say:May Jesus Christ be praised!The powers of darkness fear when this sweet chant they hear:May Jesus Christ be praised!</verse><verse>Ye nations of mankind, in this your concord find,May Jesus Christ praised!Let all the earth around ring joyous with the sound,May Jesus Christ praised!</verse><verse>In heaven's eternal bliss the loveliest strain is this,May Jesus Christ praised!Let earth, and sea and sky from depth to height reply,May Jesus Christ praised!</verse><verse>Be this, while life is mine, my canticle divine:May Jesus Christ be praised!Be this th'eternal song through all the ages long,May Jesus Christ be praised!</verse>

data.title: Morning Has Broken
data.preview: <verse>Morning has broken like the first morning,Blackbird h
data.data: <verse>Morning has broken like the first morning,Blackbird has spoken like the first bird.Praise for the singing!Praise for the morning!Praise for the springing fresh from the Word!</verse><verse>Sweet the rain's new fall sunlit from heaven,Like the first dewfall on the first grass.Praise for the sweetness of the wet garden,Sprung in completeness where His feet pass.</verse><verse>Mine is the sunlight! Mine is the morningBorn of the one light Eden saw play!Praise with elation, Praise every morning,God's recreation of the new day!</verse>

data.title: Open Now Thy Gates of Beauty
data.preview: <verse>Open now thy gates of beauty,Zion, let me enter there
data.data: <verse>Open now thy gates of beauty,Zion, let me enter there,Where my soul in joyful dutyWaits for God Who answers prayer.Oh, how bless'd is this place,Filled with solace, light, and grace!</verse><verse>Gracious God, I come before Thee,Come Thou also unto me;Where we find Thee and adore Thee,There a heav'n on earth must be.To my heart, oh, enter Thou,Let it be Thy temple now!</verse><verse>Here Thy praise is gladly chanted,Here Thy seed is duly sown;Let my soul, where it is planted,Bring forth precious sheaves alone,So that all I hear may beFruitful unto life in me.</verse><verse>Thou my faith increase and quicken,Let me keep Thy gift divine,Howsoe'er temptations thicken;May Thy Word still o'er me shineAs my guiding star through life,As my comfort in my strife.</verse><verse>Speak, O God, and I will hear Thee,Let Thy will be done indeed;May I undisturbed draw near TheeWhile Thou dost Thy people feed.Here of life the fountain flows;Here is balm for all our woes.</verse>

data.title: Abide With Me, 'Tis Eventide
data.preview: <verse>Abide with me, 'tis eventide!The day is past and gone
data.data: <verse>Abide with me, 'tis eventide!The day is past and gone;The shadows of the evening fall;The night is coming on!Within my heart a welcome guest,Within my home abide;</verse><chorus>O Savior, stay this night with me;Behold, 'tis eventide!O Savior, stay this night with me;Behold, 'tis eventide.</chorus><verse>Abide with me, 'tis eventide!Thy walk today with meHas made my heart within me burn,As I communed with Thee.Thy earnest words have filled my soulAnd kept me near Thy side;</verse><verse>Abide with me, 'tis eventide!And lone will be the night,If I cannot commune with Thee,Nor find in Thee my light.The darkness of the world, I fear,Would in my home abide;</verse>

data.title: God, Who Made the Earth and Heaven
data.preview: <verse>God, who made the earth and heaven, Darkness and ligh
data.data: <verse>God, who made the earth and heaven, Darkness and light:You the day for work have given, For rest the night.May Your angel guards defend us,Slumber sweet Your mercy send us,Holy dreams and hopes attend usAll through the night.</verse><verse>And when morn again shall call us to run life's way,May we still, what-e'er befall us, Your will obey.From the pow'r of evil hide us,In the narrow pathway guide us,Never be Your smile denied usAll through the day.</verse><verse>Guard us waking, guard us sleeping, And, when we die,May we in Your mighty keeping All peaceful lie.When the trumpet call shall wake us, Then,O Lord, do not forsake us,But to reign in glory take us with You on high.</verse><verse>Holy Father, throned in heaven, All holy Son,Holy Spirit, freely given, Blest Three in One:Grant us grace, we now implore You,Till we lay our crowns before YouAnd in worthier strains adore You while ages run.</verse>

data.title: Softly Now the Light of Day
data.preview: <verse>Softly now the light of dayFades upon out sight away:
data.data: <verse>Softly now the light of dayFades upon out sight away:Free from care, from labor free,Lord, we would commune with Thee.</verse><verse>Thou, whose all pervading eyeNought escapes, without, within,Pardon each infirmity,Open fault, and secret sin.</verse><verse>Soon from us the light of dayShall forever pass away;Then, from sin and sorrow free,Take us, Lord, to dwell with Thee.</verse>

data.title: Savior, Breathe an Evening Blessing
data.preview: <verse>Savior, breathe an evening blessing,Ere repose our sp
data.data: <verse>Savior, breathe an evening blessing,Ere repose our spirits seal;Sin and want we come confessing;Thou canst save, and Thou canst heal.</verse><verse>Though the night be dark and dreary,Darkness cannot hide from Thee;Thou art He who, never weary,Watchest where Thy people be.</verse><verse>Though destruction walk around us.Though the arrow past us fly,Angel guards from Thee Surround us, We are safe if Thou art nigh.</verse><verse>Should swift death this night o're-take us,And our couch become our tomb,May the morn of glory wake us,Clad in light and deathless bloom.</verse>

data.title: Abide With Me
data.preview: <verse>Abide with me; fast falls the eventide;The darkness d
data.data: <verse>Abide with me; fast falls the eventide;The darkness deepens; Lord with me abide!When other helpers fail and comforts flee,Help of the helpless, O abide with me.</verse><verse>Swift to its close ebbs out life's little day;Earth's joys grow dim; its glories pass away;Change and decay in all around I see;O Thou who changest not, abide with me.</verse><verse>I need Thy presence every passing hour.What but Thy grace can foil the tempter's power?Who, like Thyself, my guide and stay can be?Through cloud and sunshine, Lord, abide with me.</verse><verse>I fear no foe, with Thee at hand to bless;Ills have no weight, and tears no bitterness.Where is death's sting? Where, grave, thy victory?I triumph still, if Thou abide with me!</verse>

data.title: Day Is Dying in the West
data.preview: <verse>Day is dying in the west;Heaven is touching earth wit
data.data: <verse>Day is dying in the west;Heaven is touching earth with rest;Wait and worship while the nightSets the evening lamps alightThrough all the sky.</verse><chorus>Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts!Heaven and earth are full of Thee!Heaven and earth are praising Thee,O Lord most high!</chorus><verse>Lord of life, beneath the domeOf the universe, Thy home,Gather us who seek Thy faceTo the fold of Thy embrace,For Thou art nigh.</verse><verse>While the deepening shadows fall,Heart of love enfolding all,Through the glory and the graceOf the stars that veil Thy face,Our hearts ascend.</verse><verse>When forever from our sightPass the stars, the day, the night,Lord of angels, on our eyesLet eternal morning riseAnd shadows end.</verse>

data.title: Now the Day Is Over
data.preview: <verse>Now the day is over,Night is drawing nigh,Shadows of
data.data: <verse>Now the day is over,Night is drawing nigh,Shadows of the eveningSteal across the sky.</verse><verse>Father, give the weary,Calm and sweet repose;With Thy tenderest blessingMay our eyelids close.</verse><verse>Through the long night watches,May thine angels spreadTheir white wings above me,Watching round my bed.</verse>

data.title: All Praise to Thee
data.preview: <verse>All praise to thee, my God, this night,For all the bl
data.data: <verse>All praise to thee, my God, this night,For all the blessings of the light!Keep me, O keep me, King of kings,Beneath thine own almighty wings.</verse><verse>Forgive me, Lord, for thy dear Son,The ill that I this day have done,That with the world, myself, and thee,I, ere I sleep, at peace may be.</verse><verse>O may my soul on Thee repose,And with sweet sleep mine eyelids close,Sleep that may me more vigorous makeTo serve my God when I awake.</verse><verse>Praise God, from whom all blessings flow;Praise Him , all creatures here below;Praise Him above, ye heavenly host;Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.</verse>

data.title: O Gladsome Light
data.preview: <verse>O gladsome light, O graceOf God the Father's face,The
data.data: <verse>O gladsome light, O graceOf God the Father's face,The eternal splendor wearing;Celestial, holy, blest,Our Savior, Jesus Christ,Joyful in Thine appearing.</verse><verse>Now e'er day fadeth quite,We see the ev'ning light,Our wonted hymn outpouring;Father of might unknown,Thee His incarnate Son,And Holy Spirit adoring.</verse><verse>To Thee of right belongsAll praise of holy songs,O Son of God, life giver;Thee therefore, O most high,The world doth glorifyAnd shall exalt for ever.</verse>

data.title: Jesus, Tender Shepherd, Hear Me
data.preview: <verse>Jesus, tender Shepherd, hear me,Bless Thy little lamb
data.data: <verse>Jesus, tender Shepherd, hear me,Bless Thy little lamb tonight;Through the darkness be Thou near me;Watch my sleep till morning light.</verse><verse>All this day Thy hand has led me,And I thank Thee for Thy care;Thou hast clothed me, warmed and fed me;Listen to my evening prayer.</verse>

data.title: The Day Thou Gavest
data.preview: <verse>The day Thou gavest, Lord, is ended;the darkness fall
data.data: <verse>The day Thou gavest, Lord, is ended;the darkness falls at Thy behest;To Thee our morning hymns ascended;Thy praise shall hallow now our rest.</verse><verse>We thank Thee that Thy church, unsleepingWhile earth rolls onward into light,Through all the world her watch is keeping,And rests not now by day or night.</verse><verse>As o'er each continent and islandThe dawn leads on another day,The voice of prayer is never silent,Nor die the strains of praise away.</verse><verse>So be it, Lord; Thy throne shall never,Like earth's proud empires, pass away.Thy kingdom stands, and grows forever,Till all Thy creatures own Thy sway.</verse>

data.title: Now All the Woods Are Sleeping
data.preview: <verse>Now all the woods are sleeping,And night and stillnes
data.data: <verse>Now all the woods are sleeping,And night and stillness creepingO'er city, man, and beast;But thou, my heart, awake thee,To pray'r awhile be take thee,And praise thy Maker ere thou rest.</verse><verse>My Jesus, stay Thou by me,And let no foe come nigh me,Safe sheltered by Thy wing;But would the foe alarm me,O let him never harm me,But still Thine angels round me sing!</verse><verse>My loved ones, rest securely,From every peril surelyOur God will guard your heads;And happy slumbers send you,And bid His hosts attend you,And golden armed watch o'er your beds.</verse>

data.title: Hark, the Vesper Hymn Is Stealing
data.preview: <verse>Hark! the vesper hymn is stealingO'er the waters soft
data.data: <verse>Hark! the vesper hymn is stealingO'er the waters soft and clear;Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate, Amen.</verse><verse>Nearer yet, and nearer pealing,Soft it breaks upon the ear.Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate, Amen.</verse>

data.title: Great Our Joy as Now We Gather
data.preview: <verse>Great our joy as now we gatherWhere the Master makes
data.data: <verse>Great our joy as now we gatherWhere the Master makes us one:Where we worship God the FatherThro' the Spirit of His Son.All who search for His churchFind it where His will is done.</verse><verse>Precious is the tie that binds usTo our God when faith grows cold;Precious all that now reminds usHe is still our safe stronghold.Faithful love serves to proveHere the Shepherd has His fold.</verse><verse>May we learn from Christ's exampleHow to use this house of prayer:He who loved and cleansed His templeWants us all to worship there.God the Son shuts out none:In His Kingdom all may share.</verse><verse>Lord, inspire us with Your visionOf a world which must be won!Glorious is the church's mission,Long endeavored, scarce begun!Faithful now- this is howGod's eternal will is done.</verse>

data.title: Blessed Jesus at Thy Word
data.preview: <verse>Blessed Jesus, at Thy word,We have gathered all to he
data.data: <verse>Blessed Jesus, at Thy word,We have gathered all to hear Thee;By Thy word our hearts were stirred,Now to seek and love and fear Thee.By Thy teachings sweet and holy,Let us learn to love Thee solely.</verse><verse>All our knowledge, sense, and sight,Lie in deepest darkness shrouded;Till Thy Spirit breaks our night,With His beams of truth unclouded.He alone to God canst win us,He who works all good within us.</verse><verse>Glorious Lord, Thy self impart!Light of light, from God proceeding.Open Thou our ears and heartHelp us, by Thy Spirit's pleading.Hear the cry Thy people raises!Hear, and bless our prayer and praises!</verse>

data.title: God Is Here!
data.preview: <verse>God is here as we his peopleMeet to offer praise and
data.data: <verse>God is here as we his peopleMeet to offer praise and prayer,May we find in fuller measureWhat it is in Christ we share.Here, as in the world around us,All our varied skills and artsWait the coming of his SpiritInto open minds and hearts.</verse><verse>Here are symbols to remind usOf our lifelong need of grace;Here are table, font and pulpit;Here the Word has central place.Here in honesty of preaching,Here in silence, as in speech,Here in newness and renewal,God the Spirit comes to each.</verse><verse>Here our children find a welcomeIn the Shepherd's flock and fold.Here, as bread and wine are taken,Christ sustains us, as of old.Here the servants of the ServantSeek in worship to exploreWhat it means in daily livingTo believe and to adore.</verse><verse>Lord of all, Church and Kingdom,In an age of change and doubt,Keep us faithful to the Gospel,Help us work your purpose out.Here, in this day's dedication,All we have to give, receive:We, who cannot live without you,We adore you! We believe!</verse>

data.title: How Lovely Is Thy Dwelling Place
data.preview: <verse>How lovely is Thy dwelling place,O Lord of hosts to m
data.data: <verse>How lovely is Thy dwelling place,O Lord of hosts to me!The tabenacles of Thy graceHow pleasant, Lord, they be!</verse><verse>My thirsty soul longs ardently,Yea, faints Thy courts to see;My very heart and flesh cry out,O living God, for Thee.</verse><verse>Behold the sparrow findeth outA house where-in to rest;The swallow also, for herselfProvided hath a nest.</verse><verse>Ev'n Thine own altars, where she safeHer young ones forth may bring,O Thou, almighty Lord of hosts,Who art my God and King.</verse><verse>Blest are they in Thy house that dwell,They ever give Thee praise.Blest is the man whose strength Thou art,In whose heart are Thy ways.</verse>

data.title: O Come, Let Us Sing to the Lord
data.preview: <verse>O come, let us sing to the Lord,Come let us every one
data.data: <verse>O come, let us sing to the Lord,Come let us every oneA joyful noise make to the RockOf our salvation.</verse><verse>Let us before His presence comeWith glad and thankful voice;Let us sing psalms of praise to Him,And make a joyful noise.</verse><verse>For God, a great God and great King,Above all gods, He is;The depths of earth are in His hand,The strength of hills is His.</verse><verse>To Him the ocean vast belongs,For He the sea did make;The dry land also from His hands,Its form at first did take.</verse><verse>O come, bow down and worship Him,And kneeling, humbly pray,Come to our Maker and our God,And hear His voice today.</verse>

data.title: Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessing
data.preview: <verse>Lord, dismiss us with thy blessing;fill our hearts wi
data.data: <verse>Lord, dismiss us with thy blessing;fill our hearts with joy and peace;let us each, thy love possessing,triumph in redeeming grace.O refresh us, O refresh us,traveling through this wilderness.</verse><verse>Thanks we give and adorationfor thy gospel's joyful sound.May the fruits of thy salvationin our hearts and lives abound;ever faithful, ever faithfulto the truth may we be found.</verse>

data.title: God Be With You
data.preview: <verse>God be with you till we meet again;By His counsels gu
data.data: <verse>God be with you till we meet again;By His counsels guide, uphold you,With His sheep securely fold you;God be with you till we meet again.</verse><chorus>Till we meet, till we meet,Till we meet at Jesus' feet;Till we meet, till we meet,God be with you till we meet again.</chorus><verse>God be with you till we meet again;'Neath His wings securely hide you;Daily manna still provide you;God be with you till we meet again.</verse><verse>God be with you till we meet again;When life's perils thick confound you;Put His arms unfailing round you;God be with you till we meet again.</verse><verse>God be with you till we meet again;Keep love's banner floating over you,Strike death's threatening wave before you;God be with you till we meet again.</verse>

data.title: God Be With You
data.preview: <verse>God be with you till we meet again;By His counsels gu
data.data: <verse>God be with you till we meet again;By His counsels guide, uphold you,With His sheep securely fold you:God be with you till we meet again.</verse><verse>God be with you till we meet again;Neath His wings securely hide you,Daily manna still provide you:God be with you till we meet again.</verse><verse>God be with you till we meet again;When life's perils thick confound you,Put His arms unfailing round you:God be with you till we meet again.</verse><verse>God be with you till we meet again;Keep love's banner floating o'er you,Smite death's threatening wave before you:God be with you till we meet again.</verse>

data.title: O Lord, Now Let Your Servant
data.preview: <verse>O Lord, now let Your servantDepart in heav'nly peace
data.data: <verse>O Lord, now let Your servantDepart in heav'nly peace,For I have seen the gloryOf Your redeeming grace:A light to lead the GentilesUnto Your holy hill,The glory of Your people,Your chosen Israel.</verse><verse>Then grant that I may follow Your gleam,O glorious Light,Till earthly shadows scatter,And faith is changed to sight;Till raptured saints shall gatherUpon that shining shore,Where Christ, the blessed Day star,Shall light them evermore.</verse>

data.title: On Our Way Rejoicing
data.preview: <verse>On our way rejoicingGladly let us go;Conquer'd hath o
data.data: <verse>On our way rejoicingGladly let us go;Conquer'd hath our Leader,Vanquish'd is the foe.Christ without, our safety;Christ within, our joy;Who, if we be faithful,Can our hope destroy?</verse><chorus>On our way rejoicingAs we forward move,Hearken to our praises,O blest God of love!</chorus><verse>Unto God the FatherJoyful songs we sing,Unto God the SaviorThankful hearts we bring,Unto God the SpiritBow we and adore,On our way rejoicingNow and evermore.</verse>

data.title: Lord, Make Us More Holy
data.preview: <verse>Lord, make us more holy;Lord, make us more holy;Lord,
data.data: <verse>Lord, make us more holy;Lord, make us more holy;Lord, make us more holyUntil we meet again.</verse><verse>Lord, make us more faithful;Lord, make us more faithful;Lord, make us more faithfulUntil we meet again.</verse><verse>Lord, make us more humble;Lord, make us more humble;Lord, make us more humbleUntil we meet again.</verse><verse>Lord, make us more loving;Lord, make us more loving;Lord, make us more lovingUntil we meet again.Like Jesus, the Savior,Until we meet again.</verse>

data.title: Praise Ye the Father
data.preview: <verse>Praise ye the Father for His loving kindness,Tenderly
data.data: <verse>Praise ye the Father for His loving kindness,Tenderly cares He for His erring children;Praise Him, ye angels, praise Him in the heavens;Praise ye Jehovah!</verse><verse>Praise ye the Savior, great is the compassion,Graciously cares He for His chosen people;Young men and maidens, ye old men and children,Praise ye the Savior!</verse><verse>Praise ye the Spirit, comforter of Israel,Sent of the Father and the Son to bless us;Praise ye the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit,Praise the Eternal Three!</verse>

data.title: Come Thou Almighty King
data.preview: <verse>Come, Thou almighty King,Help us Thy name to sing,Hel
data.data: <verse>Come, Thou almighty King,Help us Thy name to sing,Help us to praise!Father all glorious,O'er all victorious,Come, and reign over us,Ancient of Days!</verse><verse>Come, Thou incarnate Word,Gird on Thy mighty sword,Our prayer attend;Come, and Thy people bless,And give Thy Word success;Spirit of holiness,On us descend!</verse><verse>Come, holy Comforter,Thy sacred witness bear,In this glad hour:Thou who almighty art,Now rule in every heart,And ne'er from us depart,Spirit of power!</verse><verse>To Thee, great One in Three,Eternal praises be,Hence, evermore:Thy sovereign majestyMay we in glory see,And to eternityLove and adore!</verse>

data.title: Creator of the Stars of Night
data.preview: <verse>Creator of the stars of night,Thy people's ever lasti
data.data: <verse>Creator of the stars of night,Thy people's ever lasting light,O Christ, Thou Savior of us all,We pray Thee, hear us when we call.</verse><verse>At the great name of Jesus, nowAll knees must bend, all hearts must bow;And things celestial Thee shall own,And things terrestial, Lord alone.</verse><verse>To God the Father, God the Son,And God the Spirit, Three in one,Laud, honor, might, and glory beFrom age to age eternally. Amen.</verse>

data.title: Holy, Holy, Holy
data.preview: <verse>Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!Early in the morn
data.data: <verse>Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty!God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!</verse><verse>Holy, holy, holy! Angels adore Thee,Casting down their bright crowns around the glassy sea;Thousands and ten thousands worship low before Thee,Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.</verse><verse>Holy, holy, holy! though the darkness hide Thee,Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see;Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee,Perfect in power, in love, and purity.</verse><verse>Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!All Thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth, and sky, and sea;Holy, holy, holy; merciful and mighty!God in three Persons, blessed Trinity!</verse>

data.title: Like a River Glorious
data.preview: <verse>Like a river glorious, is God's perfect peace,Over al
data.data: <verse>Like a river glorious, is God's perfect peace,Over all victorious, in its bright increase;Perfect, yet it floweth, fuller every day,Perfect, yet it groweth, deeper all the way.</verse><chorus>Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blessedFinding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.</chorus><verse>Hidden in the hollow of His blessed hand,Never foe can follow, never traitor stand;Not a surge of worry, not a shade of care,Not a blast of hurry touch the spirit there.</verse><verse>Every joy or testing Comes from God above,Given to His children As an act  of love;We may trust Him fully All for us to do-Those who trust Him wholly Find Him wholly true.</verse>

data.title: The Wonder of It All
data.preview: <verse>There's the wonder of sunset at evening,The wonder as
data.data: <verse>There's the wonder of sunset at evening,The wonder as sunrise I see;But the wonder of wonders that thrills my soulIs the wonder that God loves me.</verse><chorus>O, the wonder of it all!The wonder of it all!Just to think that God loves me.O, the wonder of it all!The wonder of it all!Just to think that God loves me.</chorus><verse>There's the wonder of springtime and harvest,The sky, the stars, the sun;But the wonder of wonders that thrills my soulIs the wonder that's only begun.</verse>

data.title: O Love That Wilt Not Let Me Go
data.preview: <verse>O Love that wilt not let me go,I rest my weary soul i
data.data: <verse>O Love that wilt not let me go,I rest my weary soul in thee;I give thee back the life I owe,That in thine ocean depthsIts flow may richer, fuller be.</verse><verse>O Light that followest all my way,I yield my flickering torch to thee;My heart restores its borrowed ray,That in they sunshine's blazeIts day may brighter, fairer be.</verse><verse>O Joy that seekest me through pain,I cannot close my heart to thee;I trace the rainbow thru the rain,And feel the promise is not vain,That morn shall tearless be.</verse><verse>O Cross that liftest up my head,I dare not ask to fly from thee;I lay in dust life's glory dead,And from the ground there blossomsRed life that shall endless be.</verse>

data.title: O Love of God Most Full
data.preview: <verse>O love of God most full,O love of God most free,Come
data.data: <verse>O love of God most full,O love of God most free,Come warm my heart,come fill my soul,Come lead me unto Thee.</verse><verse>Warm as the glowing sunSo shines Thy love on me,It wraps me 'round with kindly care,It draws me unto Thee.</verse><verse>The wildest sea is calm,The tempest brings no fear,The darkest night is full of light,Because Thy love is near.</verse><verse>O love of God most full,O love of God most free,It warms my heart, it fills my soul,With might it strengthens me.</verse>

data.title: For God So Loved Us
data.preview: <verse>For God so loved us,He sent the Savior:For God so lov
data.data: <verse>For God so loved us,He sent the Savior:For God so loved us,and loves me too.</verse><chorus>Love so unending!I'll sing His praises,God loves His children,Loves even me.</chorus><verse>He sent the Savior,The blest Redeemer;He sent the SaviorTo set me free.</verse><verse>He bade me welcome,O word of mercy;He bade me welcome,O voice divine.</verse><verse>Glory and honor,O Love eternal,To Him be givenwhile life shall last.</verse>

data.title: O Love of God, How Strong and True!
data.preview: <verse>O love of God, how strong and true!Eternal, and yet e
data.data: <verse>O love of God, how strong and true!Eternal, and yet ever new;Uncomprehended and unbought,Beyond all knowledge and all thought.</verse><verse>O love of God, how deep and great,Far deeper than man's deepest hate;Self-fed, self-kindled like the light,Changeless, eternal, infinite.</verse><verse>We read thee best in Him who cam To bear for us the cross of shame;Sent by the Father from on high,Our life to live, our death to die.</verse><verse>We read thy power to bless and save, E'en in the darkness of the grave;Still more in resurrection lightWe read the fullness of thy might.</verse><verse>O love of God, our shield and stayThrough all the perils of our way!Eternal love, in thee we rest,Forever safe, forever blest.</verse>

data.title: O World of God
data.preview: <verse>O world of God, so vast and strange,Profound and wond
data.data: <verse>O world of God, so vast and strange,Profound and wonderful and fair,Beyond the utmost reach of thought,But not beyond a Father's care!We are not strangers on this earthWhirling amid the suns of space;We are God's children, this our home,With those of every clime and race.</verse><verse>O world of man where life is lived,So strangely mingling joy and pain,So full of evil and of good,So needful that the good shall reign!It is this world that God has loved,And goodness was its Maker's plan,The promise of God's triumph isHis coming in a Son of Man.</verse><verse>O world of time's farstretching years!There was a day when time stood still,A central moment when there roseA cross upon a cruel hill;In pain and death love's power was seen,The mystery of time revealed,The wisdom of the ways of God,The grace through which man's hurt is healed.</verse>

data.title: Though I Speak With Tongues
data.preview: <verse>Though I speak with tongues of men and angels,Though
data.data: <verse>Though I speak with tongues of men and angels,Though I have the prophet's gift,Though I hold the keys to hidden knowledge,Though my faith can mountains shift:Without love I am no better,Without love it's all for naught;Lord, You spent Your life in loving others:What this means I would be taught.</verse><verse>Love is patient, knows no envy,Never gloats when others sin;Love is never glad to see injustice,Always wants the truth to win.There's no end to love's endurance,There's no test it cannot face;Lord, You spent Your life in loving others:I shall fail without Your grace.</verse><verse>Though there'll be an end to hidden knowledge,Visions, raptures, prophecy:Faith and hope and love shall last forever,Love the greatest of the three.Without love I am no better,Without love it's all for naught;Lord, You gave Your life in saving others:What this means I would be taught.</verse>

data.title: Before Jehovah's Awful Throne
data.preview: <verse>Before Jehovah's awful throne,Ye nations, bow with sa
data.data: <verse>Before Jehovah's awful throne,Ye nations, bow with sacred joy;Know that the Lord is God alone;He can create, and He destroy.</verse><verse>His sovereign power, without our aid,Made us of clay, and formed us men;And when like wandering sheep we strayed,He brought us to His fold again.</verse><verse>We'll crowd His gates with thankful songs,High as the heavens our voices raise;And earth, with her ten thousand tongues,Shall fill His courts with sounding praise.</verse><verse>Wide as the world is His command,Vast as Eternity His love;Firm as a rock His truth shall stand,When rolling years shall cease to move.</verse>

data.title: O Worship the King
data.preview: <verse>O worship the King, all glorious above,O gratefully s
data.data: <verse>O worship the King, all glorious above,O gratefully sing His wonderful love;Our Shield and Defender, the Ancient of Days,Pavilioned in splendor, and girded with praise.</verse><verse>O tell of His might, O sing of His grace,Whose robe is the light, whose canopy space,His chariots of wrath the deep thunderclouds form,And dark is His path on the wings of the storm.</verse><verse>Thy bountiful care, what tongue can recite?It breathes in the air, it shines in the light;It streams from the hills, it descends to the plain,And sweetly distills in the dew and the rain.</verse><verse>Frail children of dust, and feeble as frail,In Thee do we trust, nor find Thee to fail;Thy mercies how tender, how firm to the end!Our Maker, Defender, Redeemer, and Friend.</verse>

data.title: God the Omnipotent
data.preview: <verse>God the Omnipotent! King, who ordainestGreat winds Th
data.data: <verse>God the Omnipotent! King, who ordainestGreat winds Thy clarions, the lightnings Thy sword;Show forth Thy pity on high where Thou reignest,Give to us peace, O most merciful Lord.</verse><verse>God the all merciful! earth hath forsakenThy precepts holy, and slighted Thy word;Bid not Thy wrath in its terrors awaken;Give to us peace, O most merciful Lord.</verse><verse>God the all righteousness One! man hath defied Thee;Yet to eternity standeth Thy word;Falsehood and wrong shall not tarry beside Thee;Prosper the right, O most merciful Lord.</verse><verse>So shall we render Thee thankful devotion,For Thy deliverance from peril and sword,Singing in chorus from ocean to ocean,"Thine is the power and the glory, O Lord."</verse>

data.title: Eternal Father Strong to Save
data.preview: <verse>Eternal Father, strong to save,Whose arm doth bind th
data.data: <verse>Eternal Father, strong to save,Whose arm doth bind the restless wave,Who bidd'st the mighty ocean deepIts own appointed limits keep;O hear us when we cry to TheeFor those in peril on the sea.</verse><verse>O Saviour, whose almighty wordThe winds and waves submissive heard,Who walkedst on the foaming deep,And calm amid its rage didst sleep;O hear us when we cry to TheeFor those in peril on the sea.</verse><verse>O Sacred Spirit, who didst broodUpon the chaos dark and rude,Who badd'st its angry tumult cease,And gavest light and life and peace;O hear us when we cry to TheeFor those in peril on the sea.</verse><verse>O Trinity of love and power,Our brethren shield in danger's hour;From rock and tempest, fire and foe,Protect them wheresoe'er they go;And ever let there rise to TheeGlad hymns of praise from land and sea.</verse>

data.title: How Great Thou Art
data.preview: <verse>O Lord my GodWhen I in awesome wonderConsider all the
data.data: <verse>O Lord my GodWhen I in awesome wonderConsider all the worlds Thy Hands have madeI see the starsI hear the rolling thunderThy power throughout the universe displayed</verse><chorus>Then sings my soulMy Saviour God to TheeHow great Thou artHow great Thou artThen sings my soulMy Saviour God to TheeHow great Thou artHow great Thou art</chorus><verse>When through the woodsAnd forest glades I wanderAnd hear the birds sing sweetly in the treesWhen I look downFrom lofty mountain grandeurAnd see the brook and feel the gentle breeze</verse><verse>And when I thinkThat God His Son not sparingSent Him to die I scarce can take it inThat on the CrossMy burden gladly bearingHe bled and died to take away my sin.</verse><verse>When Christ shall comeWith shouts of acclamationAnd take me homeWhat joy shall fill my heartThen I shall bowIn humble adorationAnd then proclaim"My God, how great Thou art!"</verse>

data.title: God Who Spoke in the Beginning
data.preview: <verse>God who spoke in the beginning,Forming rock and shapi
data.data: <verse>God who spoke in the beginning,Forming rock and shaping spar,Set all life and growth in motion,Earthly world and distant star;He who calls the earth to orderIs the ground of what we are.</verse><verse>God who spoke thro' men and nations,Thro' events long past and gone,Showing still today His purpose,Speaks supremely through His Son;He who calls the earth to orderGives His word and it is done.</verse><verse>God whose speech becomes incarnate-Christ is servant, Christ is Lord-Calls us to a life of service,Heart and will to action stirred;He who uses man's obedienceHas the first and final word.</verse>

data.title: I Sing the Mighty Power of God
data.preview: <verse>I sing the almighty power of God,That made the mounta
data.data: <verse>I sing the almighty power of God,That made the mountains rise,That spread the flowing seas abroad,And built the lofty skies.I sing the wisdom that ordainedThe sun to rule the day;The moon shines full at God's command,And all the stars obey.</verse><verse>I sing the goodness of the Lord,Who filled the earth with food,Who formed the creatures thru the Word,And then pronounced them good.Lord, how thy wonders are displayed,Where'er I turn my eye,If I survey the ground I tread,Or gaze upon the sky!</verse><verse>There's not a plant or flower below,But makes thy glories known,And clouds arise, and tempests blow,By order from thy thrown;While all that borrows life from theeIs ever in thy care;And everywhere that we can be,Thou, God, art present there.</verse>

data.title: Let All on Earth Their Voices Raise
data.preview: <verse>Let all the earth their voices raise,To sing the grea
data.data: <verse>Let all the earth their voices raise,To sing the great Jehovah's praise,And bless His holy name:His glory let the people know,His wonders to the nations show,His saving grace proclaim.</verse><verse>He framed the globe; He built the sky;He made the shining worlds on high,And reigns in glory there:His beams are majesty and light;His beauties, how divinely bright!His dwelling place, how fair!</verse><verse>Come, the great day, the glorious hour,When earth shall feel His saving power,All nations fear His name;Then shall the race of men confessThe beauty of His holiness,His saving grace proclaim.</verse>

data.title: Eternal God, Whose Power Upholds
data.preview: <verse>Eternal God, whose power upholds Both flower and flam
data.data: <verse>Eternal God, whose power upholds Both flower and flaming star,To whom there is no here nor there, No time, no near nor far,No alien race, no foreign shore, No child unsought, unknown:O send us forth, Your prophets true, To make all lands Your own!</verse><verse>O God of truth, whom science seeks And reverent souls adore,Illumine every earnest mind Of every clime and shore:Dispel the gloom of error's night, Of ignorance and fear,Until true wisdom from above Shall make life's pathway clear!</verse><verse>O God of beauty, oft revealed In dreams of human art,In speech that flows to melody, In holiness of heart:Teach us to ban al ugliness, And all disharmony,Till all shall know the loveliness Of lives made fair and free!</verse><verse>O God of righteousness and grace, Seen in the Christ, Your Son,Whose life and death reveal Your face, By whom Your will was done;Help us to spread Your gracious reign Till greed and hate shall cease,And kindness dwell in human hearts, And all the earth find peace!</verse>

data.title: Ye Watchers and Ye Holy Ones
data.preview: <verse>Ye watchers and ye holy ones,Bright seraphs, cherubim
data.data: <verse>Ye watchers and ye holy ones,Bright seraphs, cherubim and thrones,Raise the glad strain, Alleluia!Cry out, dominions, princedoms, powers,Virtues, archangels, angels' choirs:</verse><chorus>Alleluia! Alleluia!Alleluia! Alleluia!Alleluia!</chorus><verse>O higher than the cherubim,More glorious than the seraphim,Lead their praises, Alleluia!Thou bearer of th'eternal Word,Most gracious, magnify the Lord.</verse><verse>O friends, in gladness let us sing,Supernal anthems echoing,Alleluia! Alleluia!To God the Father, God the Son,And God the Spirit, Three in One.</verse>

data.title: This Is My Father's World
data.preview: <verse>This is my Father's world, And to my listening ears A
data.data: <verse>This is my Father's world, And to my listening ears All nature sings, and round me rings The music of the spheres. This is my Father's world: I rest me in the thought Of rocks and trees, of skies and seas;His hand the wonders wrought.</verse><verse>This is my Father's world, The birds their carols raise, The morning light, the lily white, Declare their maker's praise. This is my Father's world: He shines in all that's fair; In the rustling grass I hear Him pass; He speaks to me everywhere.</verse><verse>This is my Father's world. O let me ne'er forget That though the wrong seems oft so strong, God is the ruler yet. This is my Father's world: Why should my heart be sad? The Lord is King; let the heavens ring! God reigns; let the earth be glad!</verse>

data.title: All Things Bright and Beautiful
data.preview: </verse><chorus>All things bright and beautifulAll creature
data.data: </verse><chorus>All things bright and beautifulAll creatures great and smallAll things wise and wonderfulThe Lord God made them all.</chorus>Each little flow'r that opensEach little bird that singsHe made their glowing coloursHe made their tiny wings.</verse><verse>The purple-headed mountainThe river running byThe sunset and the morningThat brighten up the sky.</verse><verse>The cold wind in the winterThe pleasant summer sunThe ripe fruits in the gardenHe made them, every one.</verse><verse>He gave us eyes to see themAnd lips that we might tellHow great is God AlmightyWho has made all things well.</verse>

data.title: Nature With Open Volume Stands
data.preview: <verse>Nature with open volume stands,To spread its Maker's
data.data: <verse>Nature with open volume stands,To spread its Maker's praise abroad;And every labor of His handsShows something worthy of our God.</verse><verse>But in the grace that rescued usHis brightest form of glory shines;'Tis fairest drawn upon the crossIn precious blood and crimson lines.</verse><verse>Here His whole name appears complete.Nor wit can guess, nor reason prove,Which of the letters best is writ,The pow'r, the wisdom, or the love.</verse><verse>We would forever speak His nameIn sounds to mortal ears unknown,With angels join to praise the Lamb,And worship at His Father's throne.</verse>

data.title: Spring Has Now Unwrapped the Flowers
data.preview: <verse>Spring has now unwrapped the flowers,Day is fast revi
data.data: <verse>Spring has now unwrapped the flowers,Day is fast reviving,Life in all her growing powersTowards the light is striving:Gone the iron touch of cold,Winter time and frost time,Seedlings, working through the mould,Now make up for lost time.</verse><verse>Herb and plant that winter long,Slumbered at their leisure,Now be stirring, green and strong,Find in growth their pleasure:All the world with beauty fills,Gold the green enhacing;Flowers make glee among the hills,Set the meadows dancing.</verse><verse>Through each wonder of fair daysGod Himself expresses;Beauty follows all His ways,As the world He blesses:So, as He renews the earth,Artist without rival,In His grace of glad new birthWe must seek revival.</verse>

data.title: The Spacious Firmament
data.preview: <verse>The spacious firmament on high,With all the blue, eth
data.data: <verse>The spacious firmament on high,With all the blue, ethereal sky, And spangled heavens, a shining frame, Their great Original proclaim. Th'unwearied sun from day to day Does his Creator's power display, And publishes to every land The work of an almighty hand</verse><verse>Soon as the evening shades prevail,The moon takes up the wondrous tale;And nightly to the listening earth Repeats the story of her birth;While all the stars that round her burn, And all the planets in their turn,Confirm the tidings as they roll,And spread the truth from pole to pole</verse><verse>What though in solemn silence all Move round the dark terrestrial ball?What though no real voice nor sound Amid their radiant orbs be found?In reason's ear they all rejoiceAnd utter forth a glorious voice,Forever singing as they shine,"The hand that made us is divine."</verse>

data.title: Lord of the Boundless Curves of Space
data.preview: <verse>Lord of the boundless curves of spaceAnd time's deep
data.data: <verse>Lord of the boundless curves of spaceAnd time's deep mystery,To Your creative might we traceAll nature's energy.</verse><verse>Your mind conceived the galaxy,Each atom's secret planned,And every age of historyYour purpose, Lord, has spanned.</verse><verse>Yours is the image stamped on man,Though marred by man's own sin;And Yours the liberating planAgain his soul to win.</verse><verse>Give us to know Your truth; but more,The strength to do Your will;Until the love our souls adoreShall all our being fill.</verse>

data.title: Can You Count the Stars?
data.preview: <verse>Can you count the stars that brightlyTwinkle in the m
data.data: <verse>Can you count the stars that brightlyTwinkle in the midnight sky?Can you count the clouds, so lightlyO'er the meadows floating by?God, the Lord, doth mark their numberWith His eyes that never slumber;He hath made every one,He hath made them every one.</verse><verse>Can you count the wings now flashingIn the sunshine's golden light?Can you count the fishes splashingIn the cooling waters bright?God, the Lord, a name hath given,To all creatures under heaven;He hath named them every one,He hath named them every one.</verse><verse>Do you know how many childrenRise each morning blithe and gay?Can you count their jolly voices,Singing sweetly day by day?God hears all the happy voices,In their merry songs rejoices;And He loves them, every one,And He loves them, every one.</verse>

data.title: God Will Take Care of You
data.preview: <verse>Be not dismayed whate'er betide, God will take care o
data.data:
Be not dismayed whate'er betide, God will take care of you; Beneath his wings of love abide, God will take care of you.God will take care of you, Through every day, o'er all the way; He will take care of you, God will take care of you.Through days of toil when heart doth fail, God will take care of you; When dangers fierce your path assail, God will take care of you.All you may need he will provide, God will take care of you; Nothing you ask will be denied, God will take care of you.No matter what may be the test, God will take care of you;Lean, weary one, upon his breast, God will take care of you.

p

data.title: Great Is Thy Faithfulness
data.preview: <verse>Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father;There is n
